se.dat255.bulletinferno.model.map
Interface Segment

All Superinterfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
All Known Implementing Classes:
SegmentImpl
public interface Segment
extends Disposable

A Segment is a holder of map slices, building up a part that looks alike in the game.

Method Summary
 float getEntryHeight()
          Gets the entry height (i.e. the height of the leftmost Slice) of the Segment.
 float getExitHeight()
          Gets the exit height (i.e. the height of the rightmost Slice) of the Segment.
 com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 getPosition()
          Gets the starting position of the Segment.
 java.util.List<? extends Slice> getSlices()
          Gets all slices contained within this Segment.
 float getWidth()
          Gets the width of the Segment, which is equal to the combined width of all slices within the Segment.
 
Methods inherited from interface se.dat255.bulletinferno.util.Disposable
